block.p: Elisa Herrin Miller, a daughter of Carole and Ronald M. Miller of Dix Hills, N.Y., is to be married this evening to Peter Warren Braverman, the son of Judith and Richard Braverman of Hewlett, N.Y. Rabbi Howard Buechler is to perform the ceremony at the Jericho Jewish Center in Jericho, N.Y.

The bride, 28, teaches the first grade at the Winthrop Avenue Primary Center in Bellmore, N.Y. She graduated from Hofstra University, from which she also received a master's degree in reading. Her father is the president of the Marks Polarized Corporation, an optical filters manufacturer in Holtsville, N.Y. Her mother owns Compumail Business Services, a customized mailing concern in Dix Hills.

Elisa Herrin Miller, a daughter of Carole and Ronald M. Miller of Dix Hills, N.Y., is to be married this evening to Peter Warren Braverman, the son of Judith and Richard Braverman of Hewlett, N.Y. Rabbi Howard Buechler is to perform the ceremony at the Jericho Jewish Center in Jericho, N.Y.

The bride, 28, teaches the first grade at the Winthrop Avenue Primary Center in Bellmore, N.Y. She graduated from Hofstra University, from which she also received a master's degree in reading. Her father is the president of the Marks Polarized Corporation, an optical filters manufacturer in Holtsville, N.Y. Her mother owns Compumail Business Services, a customized mailing concern in Dix Hills.

The bridegroom, 27, is a senior architect at the Spector Group, an architectural firm in North Hills, N.Y. He graduated from Roger Williams University. His father is a partner in BravermanWarfield, a law firm in New Hyde Park, N.Y., and the president of the Hewlett-Woodmere (N.Y.) Board of Education. The bridegroom's mother teaches English as a second language at the Lindell Boulevard School in Long Beach, N.Y.
